chunk:
Olio E Osso Finishing Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: Olio E Osso

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Kernel Oil, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Fruit Oil, Borago Officinalis (Borage) Seed Oil, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium)

aveolens (Geranium) Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf

Directions: Smooth 4-5 drops onto the palm of your hand and apply to clean face and neck. Repeat as needed. Best used after Olio E Osso Oil Cleanse.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
